problem.p: For the Landscape Arch example where height=24m, what is the compressive force in the arch if the span is 75m instead of 88m? Assume that the load on the arch remains the same at 222.8kN/m.

choicegroup.label: For the Landscape Arch example where height=24m, what is the compressive force in the arch if the span is 75m instead of 88m?

div.p: As the span (or length, L) decreases the compressive force in the arch will also decrease.
